ruling: - You declare the Type of monster when you activate this card, not when it resolves. This means you pick the Type before the opponent decides whether to chain or not.
- You cannot change your mind about the Type after you activate this card. The declared Type remains the same as long as this card is on the field.
- This card does not target, so the effects of [[Lord of D.]] or [[Frontier Wiseman]] will not protect monsters from this card's effect.
- If the Type of a monster is changed (for example by the effect of [[DNA Surgery]]) during the turn which it was Summoned, it may attack that turn.
